sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Disclosure, Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ArrowPathIcon, Bars3Icon, ChartPieIcon, CursorArrowRaysIcon, XMarkIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { ChevronDownIcon, TvIcon, TicketIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import logo from '../assets/logos/wc-logo.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const events = [ { name: 'Upcoming', link: '/events', icon: ChartPieIcon }, { name: 'Past', link: '/events', icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon } ] const callsToAction = [ { name: 'Buy Tickets', link: 'https://www.threepillarpromotions.com/event-details/warriors-cup-51-road-to-one', icon: TicketIcon }, { name: 'View Online', link: 'https://bxngtv.com/', icon: TvIcon }, ] const athletes = [ { name: 'Titleholders', link: '/titleholders', icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon }, { name: 'All Athletes', link: '/athletes', icon: ChartPieIcon } ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Header({user}) { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false) return (
Warrior's Cup
Events
{events.map((item) => (
{item.name}
))}
{callsToAction.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
Athletes
{athletes.map((item) => (
{item.name}
))}
Announcements Connect { user ? user &&

{user.username}

: null }
Warrior's Cup
{({ open }) => ( <> Events {[...events, ...callsToAction].map((item) => ( {item.name} ))} )} {({ open }) => ( <> Athletes {[...athletes].map((item) => ( {item.name} ))} )} Announcements Connect
) }
